text: Has anyone found a way to call serverless functions from a "Custom Code" workflow action? Looking for similar functionality to what CRM Extension cards can do - ie: accessing CRM Data and calling functions to do more complex stuff.

Custom Coded Actions allow you to make external requests.

You can access all the CRM data you need with the HubSpot Client library for Node/Python.

I'm not sure though if you can access Serverless endpoints that are used in the CMS / CRM Extensions.

Are you trying to re-use some existing code?

yes, I have code that i'm trying to re-use that uses some libraries (dayjs, etc) not allowed within Custom Code actions.  It is possible to use serverless functions with endpoints within Custom Code actions, but that requires licenses not otherwise needed.
Please share what you mean by "requires licenses not otherwise needed"

It seems that Content Hub enterprise is required to use Serverless functions *with endpoints*. a Project including endpoints won't successfully build (hs project upload) without CH Ent.  error message:  `[/app/app.functions/serverless.json]  Your HubSpot plan doesn't include endpoint for app functions, so you can't use them to create app functions with endpoint. Remove the `endpoint` property from /app/app.functions/serverless.json. If you need access, talk to your admin about upgrading your plan.`
Is it possible to use serverless functions to generate emails using external content?
